name: Zero Girl
description:
---
This is an easy role-playing game
Once upon a time, we dreamed of facing the sea and the warmth of spring blooming
We dream of retreating to the mountains and fields, where the farmer's spring has a bit of a field
---
Our protagonist is a very beautiful girl! Young, cute, and full of vitality
But for some reason, she chose to drop out of school
Then stay away from the city, away from the hustle and bustle, away from the campus
No one knows why she made this decision. Don't ask me, I don't know either
---
She came to the deep mountains and chose this place
She just wants to find a peaceful life here, looking for inner peace and tranquility
What do you need to do?
Construction~
Planting~
Animal husbandry~
Breeding~
Logging~
Mining~
Hunting~
wait
Are there any supernatural experts hidden in the deep mountains, and are there really any spells?
--
Meanwhile, our protagonist's circle of good friends, classmates, and friends
Come here during the summer vacation to play with her (song ming)
--
What should we do?
What will happen with their arrival?
--
--
developers: 修身养性齐家治国平天下
publishers: 修身养性齐家治国平天下
